description: It works you just got to do snap info and you see the command list
But Imalso being hacked b y some memnber of some team . and all my stuff is disappearin.

Works, just gotta run it right. Do a tab comlpete on
aircrack-ng-snap.
to see all the available tools in the suite

1. $ snap list
2. $ snap info aircrack-ng-snap
3. $ sudo run aircrack-ng-snap.\insert whichever tool/

commands:
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airbase-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.aircrack-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airdecap-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airdecloak-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.aireplay-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airmon-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airodump-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airolib-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airserv-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.airtun-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.besside-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.besside-ng-crawler
 - aircrack-ng-snap.buddy-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.ethtool
 - aircrack-ng-snap.info
 - aircrack-ng-snap.ivstools
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iw
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iwconfig
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iwevent
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iwgetid
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iwlist
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iwpriv
 - aircrack-ng-snap.iwspy
 - aircrack-ng-snap.kstats
 - aircrack-ng-snap.lsusb
 - aircrack-ng-snap.makeivs-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.packetforge-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.rfkill
 - aircrack-ng-snap.tkiptun-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.usbhid-dump
 - aircrack-ng-snap.wesside-ng
 - aircrack-ng-snap.wpaclean


and if you put help at the end of the command it should show a list of commands for the command you are running.

I haven't really looked much past this point so you are on your own after this. It took me a minute to figure this out. personally since it doesn't have a gui command line is way better. you can do the same only quicker by piping commands through each other.
